reviews.review: It's portal 2.
Ce jeu est bien réalisé, bien fini et cool à jouer, il y a de bonne énigme assez dur, mais le seul petit défauts est qu'il a peu de contenu

"Portal" (2007) will bend your mind.

In "Portal", you take control of Chell, an Aperture Science test subject that is awakened to pass through a number of test chambers with a gun that produces portals.

Gameplay wise, the game plays like your usual Source engine FPS, and the graphics are on-par with games such as "Counter-Strike: Source" or "Half-Life 2". The puzzles are easy to understand if you take your time to learn how the portal gun functions, and you should only struggle with the final couple of chambers.

Overall, I give "Portal" a 7/10. Not worth full price, but definitely worth it if it's on discount.
Отличная игра

Main story is overall great, not very challenging and a bit too short. However advanced chambers and challenges are difficult, especially if you want to beat the game on 100% which means you need to get gold(cake) on all challenges. Absolutely recommended, it is a must play game.

I'm years late to the Portal party but I've certainly enjoyed the... cake ;) 

Not only does Portal offer extremely entertaining game mechanics, it is also sure to keep you chuckling with its dry, witty humour. If, like me, you've managed to avoid this gem for over a decade then I'd urge you to reconsider. In short, I see no reason to not recommend this game to everyone.

Portal - это такой небольшой эксперимент который после вылился в возможно одну из лучших игр поколения: собсна вторую часть. Сказал бы что слишком короткая, но прохождение дополнительных челленджей продлит игру в два, а то и в три раза. Ну и не могу не отметить саунд. Композиция из титров Still Alive в свое время стала фурором и вполне заслуженно.
Однозначно рекомендую.

Highly recommended! It's a very funny and enjoyable game. I like the humour aspect and the puzzles certainly make you think. It's quite mind bending at times to get your head around where the warping will take you. I've just bought Portal 2 and hadn't quite completed Portal 1 so I'm doing that first before exploring Portal 2.

The game was incredibly short but I didnt mind because it was extremely fulfilling. The design of the puzzles and the general structure of the game was excellent. The game is able to communicate so much with very little words. I only got seriously stuck in one part but eventually i was able to figure out how the puzzle would be solved and had no problems from their. 

I would recommend this game to any puzzle lover or people the are new to gaming or just first person shooter as this game allows you to learn the mechanics of the game (and fps) without too much stress like someone constantly shooting back at you.
